channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: HHS Report Exposes the Risks of Gender Experimentation on Children
item.description: Unfortunately, no new policy can undo the harm that has already been inflicted on the young and vulnerable.

item.title: U.S. added 177K jobs in April; strong report buoys markets
item.description: The U.S. added 177,000 in April and the unemployment rate was unchanged at 4.2%, the government said in a stronger-than-expected report.

item.title: PPG CEO says company is ready to navigate Trump tariff uncertainty: ‘Our top 30 suppliers for our U.S. businesses, 0 of them are Chinese’
item.description: PPG reported net sales of $3.68 billion for the quarter, a 4% decline from the year prior, impacted by foreign exchange rates and recent divestitures.

item.title: Trump orders Corporation for Public Broadcasting to cease federal funding for NPR and PBS
item.description: President Trump signed an executive order ending taxpayer subsidization of National Public Radio and the Public Broadcasting Service.

item.title: ‘Oblivion’ Video Game Remaster Destroys The Original With Trans Pandering
item.description: In their endless quest to destroy all things fun, radical leftists have sunk their talons into yet another beloved gaming property.

item.title: Exit Waltz

item.title: We Need Cheap Stuff, and Lots of It

item.title: Japan’s historic work ethic is declining—45% of workers admit they’re quiet quitting
item.description: Workers said they do the basics required for their jobs for various reasons, but cite wanting a better work-life balance.

item.title: Fla. AG to rebuff judge who ordered halt to state immigration enforcement: 'The court has overstepped'
item.description: Florida Attorney General James Uthmeier is under fire for how he has handled a federal judge's order against the state's immigration law.

item.title: The Tax Code Should Not Be a Game of Hide-and-Seek
item.description: Lawmakers should push against efforts to lift the SALT cap, and they should keep an eye toward bringing additional transparency to the tax system.

item.title: Brown University in GOP crosshairs after student's DOGE-like email kicks off frenzy
item.description: Rep. Troy Nehls is writing to Brown University questioning its endowment and handling of a student who sent a DOGE-like email to staff.
